meaningMnemonic: The <radical>stop</radical> radical is the same as the <kanji>stop</kanji> kanji.
readingMnemonic: You have to <kanji>stop</kanji> because there is a <reading>shee</reading>p (し) in front of you. You try to walk around the sheep, but it moves to stop in front of you again. Every time the sheep stops you stop too.
